purpose.summary: This JCL job invokes the REPROC procedure to perform a file reproduction from a VSAM KSDS input dataset to a new sequential fixed-block output backup dataset. It specifies the input as AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.VSAM.KSDS and output as AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(+1). The procedure library is loaded from AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PROC.
purpose.business_context: Backup process for CardDemo application transaction VSAM data

inputs.name: PRC001.FILEIN
inputs.description: Source VSAM KSDS dataset containing transaction records

outputs.name: PRC001.FILEOUT
outputs.description: Backup copy of input VSAM records in fixed-block format (LRECL=350, RECFM=FB)

business_rules.description: Implements versioned backups using generational dataset name qualifier (+1)
business_rules.logic_summary: Output DSN specified as AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP(+1) to create next generation of GDG backup

error_handling.action: DELETE and uncatalog output dataset (per DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE))

open_questions.question: Detailed logic and steps within REPROC procedure
open_questions.context: REPROC is an external procedure from AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PROC library; source not provided
open_questions.suggestion: Analyze PROC definition in AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.PROC(REPROC) and CNTLLIB=AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.CNTL

open_questions.question: Record layout of input VSAM file
open_questions.context: JCL does not define record structure; repro copies all records
open_questions.suggestion: Examine associated COBOL copybook or VSAM cluster definition
